text: The 1909 Denver Pioneers football team represented the University of Denver during the 1909 college football season. In its fourth season under head coach John P. Koehler, the team compiled a 7–2 record, allowed an average of 3.4 points per game, and outscored all opponents by a total of 177 to 31. ==Schedule== ==References== Denver Category:Denver Pioneers football seasons Denver Pioneers football
title: 1909 Denver Pioneers football team
